about_the_game:
TimeParadox is a solitaire-inspired game focused on arranging and organizing cards using various functional cards.

It incorporates time travel and astronomy elements, creating a relaxing and engaging experience. Your goal is to move required cards to their destinations and sort them in a circular ascending sequence. Every card on the board matters—every move is a puzzle, and every decision leads to new possibilities, dramatically altering the course of your run.

Key Features:

  • The definitive endless game experience: Keep going, universe explorer—venture into infinity and become infinite.

  • Endless possibilities: Every choice, discard, and card usage can dramatically change the outcome of your run.

  • Time travel and immersive cosmic themes: Dive deep into the mysteries of the universe and experience a unique blend of strategy and discovery.

Use a combination of control cards and stop cards to strategically advance through time, unlocking powerful special cards that depict pivotal astronomical and evolutionary events. Every move is a test of strategy, and every decision brings you closer to mastering the art of time travel.

What Makes TimeParadox Unique:

  • 100+ digit cards: Make the game full of endless possibilities.

  • 20+ control cards: Allow for massive possibilities in movement and strategy.

  • 20+ special cards: Each with unique abilities that redefine your strategy.

  • Diverse events: Each event introduces a distinct challenge, adding depth and strategic complexity to the game.

  • Challenging goals: Organizing and moving objectives add complexity, surpassing traditional solitaire.

  • Immersive card designs: Featuring celestial objects, historical milestones, and significant events for a captivating experience.

Immerse yourself in the mysterious universe. Let curiosity wash over you—relax, escape the daily grind, and prepare to explore the ultimate infinite cosmos.

Improve your card collection and uncover new mysteries with every single run. Use the in-depth stats screen to study your best moves, plan ahead, and extend your gameplay. Enjoy detailed, stylish universe-inspired art and let the wonders of astronomy guide your journey.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Any Intel or Apple Silicon processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: TimeParadox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A solitaire-inspired game, TimeParadox challenges players to organize cards using various functional cards. With a focus on strategy, problem-solving, and a hint of luck, the game offers a relaxing yet engaging experience.
